unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: Margin of Error Calculation
question_text: A biologist hopes to estimate the proportion of alligators in Florida that are adult. When sampling alligators, the biologist computes the one-proportion $Z$ -interval going from $0.67$ to $0.74$ at $99\%$ confidence. The margin of error for a $95\%$ confidence interval would be
